app_descript:
App Name: Qantas Airways
App Package Name: au.com.qantas.qantas

Brief: Fly with confidence using the Qantas Airways app, your ultimate travel companion. This comprehensive mobile platform simplifies flight-related tasks, such as seat selection, check-in, and lounge access, ensuring a seamless journey from start to finish. Tailored for both leisure and business travelers, the app offers personalized flight details, in-flight entertainment previews, journey inspirations, and navigational assistance to the airport, along with convenient mobile boarding passes.

  • üëÄ Journey Extras: Explore accommodation, dining, and activity suggestions for a more enjoyable stay üè®.
